Uses of Class
org.forgerock.openam.entitlement.rest.model.json.PolicyRequest

  • Packages that use PolicyRequest 
    Package Description
    org.forgerock.openam.entitlement.rest
    REST (CREST) endpoint for managing entitlements policies and evaluating policy decisions.
    org.forgerock.openam.entitlement.rest.model.json
    Data model for the entitlements resource.

    • Uses of PolicyRequest in org.forgerock.openam.entitlement.rest

      Builds a request for the given action type.
      Methods in org.forgerock.openam.entitlement.rest with parameters of type PolicyRequest 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      List<Entitlement> PolicyEvaluator.routePolicyRequest​(PolicyRequest request)
      Given a generic policy request, routes the request to the appropriate evaluation method.

    • Uses of PolicyRequest in org.forgerock.openam.entitlement.rest.model.json

      Subclasses of PolicyRequest in org.forgerock.openam.entitlement.rest.model.json 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  BatchPolicyRequest
      A policy request that takes a batch of resources and is used to render a policy decision for each.
      class  TreePolicyRequest
      A policy request that takes a single resource and is used to render policy decisions for that resource and for all policies that match sub-resources of that resource.
